My work produces huge amounts of waste, would be handy to recycle it. Right now I'm planning to grind the items. I want to leave any options open though, so I created a case with conveyor belts.

It can supply any tool with energy and activate it. In this process the machine can decompose a suitable workpiece into up to 9 parts, the speed of which depends on the power of the embedded computer system.
